author: potuz

author: trent_vanepps
content:
proof of personhood through retina scanning. proprietary hardware, software, saw a lot of hype and investment announcement ~6 months ago. uses cool tech like zk to break link between retina data and the assigned address. uses their own version of hubble as an L2 to scale

general reaction: cool tech but suspicious on the dystopic vibes
